channel.title: CVE Feed for NinjaTeam -- Click to Chat – WP Support All-in-One Floating Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NinjaTeam -- Click to Chat – WP Support All-in-One Floating Widget

item.title: CVE-2024-49281|2024-10-17T19:15:28.119Z -- ninjateam -- click%20to%20chat%20%E2%80%93%20wp%20support%20all-in-one%20floating%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in NinjaTeam Click to Chat – WP Support All-in-One Floating Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Click to Chat – WP Support All-in-One Floating Widget: from n/a through 2.3.3.
